title: Korochan: the little bear
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and James Sage
brief_description: A Japanese folk tale similar to the story of the Three Bears. Descibes the escapades of a fun-loving, disobedient baby bear named Korochan. Throughout these escapades, a warm story of family love and understanding develops.
